meanings.sent1: The pronouncer read the story aloud to the class.
meanings.sent2: The pronouncer at the spelling bee said the word clearly.
meanings.sent3: The pronouncer had a funny accent that made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a pronouncer of elegance and grace.
meanings.sent5: The pronouncer's voice echoed through the room, captivating everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A person who declares or announces something officially.
meanings.sent1: The pronouncer announced the winner of the contest.
meanings.sent2: The pronouncer declared the meeting open.
meanings.sent3: The pronouncer made the announcement with a flourish.
meanings.sent4: Her confident tone was a pronouncer of authority.
meanings.sent5: The pronouncer's words rang out, filling the room with importance.

meanings.definition: An official who declares the winner of a competition.
meanings.sent1: The pronouncer declared the champion of the race.
meanings.sent2: The pronouncer announced the victor of the game.
meanings.sent3: The pronouncer wore a silly hat while awarding the trophy.
meanings.sent4: His gesture of handing over the medal was a pronouncer of sportsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The pronouncer's smile revealed the joy of victory on the winner's face.
